template.pursuit_status: Inflicts [Tuning] status on {target_text} for {duration}s. While active: Cannot act, {up_down} MP Charge by {value_html}. {trigger}, "{call_skill_name}" is triggered (Max 1 time per sec).
trigger_text.any_ally_atk_after: After an ally uses an attack skill
template.chase_normal_attack_on_skill: Grants {target_text} [Follow-up Attack ({attack_text}) on Skill Activation] for {duration}s.
